findings.title: Weak PRNG (Pseudo-random number generator)
findings.description: Do not use block.timestamp as source randomness as this can be manipulated by miners.

findings.title: Return value of an external transfer/transfer from is not checked
findings.description: The return value of an external transfer or transferFrom function is not checked, which can lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Calls to a function sending ether to an arbitrary address
findings.description: The setDevWalletAddress function allows the owner to set an arbitrary address to receive Ether, which can lead to loss of funds or unintended transactions.

findings.title: All fees transferred to one address will be mixed up and difficult to trace
findings.description: The owner can set various fee percentages, including tax, dev, liquidity, or maxTxPercent, which are stored in separate variables but may be combined into a single address, making it challenging to track individual fees.
